question:
(a) State the keyboard shortcut keys to;

(i) rotate an object in CorelDraw

(ii) position an object in CorelDraw

(iii) navigate to cell A1 in MS Excel worksheet

(b) Give one reason for including the plus sign (+) in the search text in a search engine.

(c) With the aid of diagrams, differentiate between LAN and WAN.
answer:
(a)(i) Alt + F8/ Alt + Right Arrow/ Alt + Left Arrow/ Alt + Up Arrow

(ii) Alt + F7

(iii) Ctrl + Home

(b) It is used to indicate terms that must be returned or included in the search resultss or it is a command that tells us the search engine to find pages that have the exact same term.

(c) Difference between LAN and WANÂ
